EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-General.Email 11_Unification cloud for large enterprise
EmailTemplate.subject: See how other enterprises successfully implemented a unification cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> SUCCESSFUL cloud implementations reveal best practices Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Leverage what others have learned on the road to a successful unification cloud and avoid all the drawbacks from the new architecture development process.
Read the use case “Unification cloud for large enterprises <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XT_Unification.Cloud.LargeEnterprise.LP.html?did=d000000000b1&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 11a-unificationcloudforLEusecase&utm_term=general]]>” to learn how the Nokia overlay cloud solution has been successfully applied across multiple implementations and how you can:
- Unify and simplify even a large enterprise environment arising from mergers and acquisitions into a coherent cloud - Get mission-critical network control and security - Reduce total cost of ownership (TCO) by at least 25 percent!
I hope that you enjoy this use case! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
